message: Let's settle this quickly. 800,000 for me and 200,000 for you. A fair deal considering the time pressure.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This offer recognizes the time pressure we both face.
Bob, time is ticking. This is my final offer above your previous one. Don't be greedy!
Alice, this is a compromise. It accounts for the time pressure but is fairer than your previous offers.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a hit from inflation, yet you're still being stubborn. Meet me in the middle!
Alice, I understand the pressure from inflation, but I need a fair deal too. This is my final compromise.
